foreignNames.flavor: La population de Terisiare vivait sur la glace, convaincue de sa solidité. Sa rupture, due au Dégel, lui fit reprendre conscience de la dure réalité.

foreignNames.name: Crioclasma
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una Pianura o un'Isola bersaglio. Il Crioclasma infligge 3 danni al controllore di quella terra.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli abitanti di Terisiare si erano abituati a vivere sui campi ghiacciati come se fossero solido terreno. Ma la differenza fu loro ben chiara davanti ai crepacci aperti dal Disgelo.

foreignNames.name: 氷結地獄
foreignNames.text: 平地１つか島１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。 氷結地獄はその土地のコントローラーに３点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: テリシアの人々は、まるで硬い大地の上のように氷の平原で生活していた。 "雪解けの時"が裂け目を作るまでは、誰もその違いを気に留めもしなかった。

foreignNames.name: Crioclasma
foreignNames.text: Destrua a Planície ou Ilha alvo. Crioclasma causa 3 pontos de dano ao controlador daquele terreno.
foreignNames.flavor: O povo de Terisiare veio para viver em campos congelados como se fosse terra firme. Nada os lembrava da diferença mais claramente que as rachaduras causadas pelo Degelo.

foreignNames.name: Ледолом
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевую Равнину или Остров. Ледолом наносит 3 повреждения игроку, контролирующему ту землю.
foreignNames.flavor: Народы Терисиара привыкли жить на этих ледяных полях, как будто это твердая почва. Но различие стало слишком очевидным, когда Оттепель стала вызывать разломы.

foreignNames.name: 凛寒断层
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标平原或海岛。 凛寒断层对该地的操控者造成3点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 泰瑞西亚居民开始在冰结地表上居住，把此处当成是平稳大地。 在大解冻来临、裂口四现之前，他们几乎忘记了其间的不同。

cards.name: Earth Elemental
cards.flavor: Earth elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

foreignNames.name: Erdelementar
foreignNames.flavor: Erdelementare besitzen die ewige Stärke der Steine und die Dauerhaftigkeit der Berge. Von Urbeginn an mit dem Land verbunden, das sie bewohnen, betrachten sie die Welt mit langfristigem Blick und verachten die ungestüme Hast der kurzlebigen und sterblichen Welt.

foreignNames.name: Elemental de tierra
foreignNames.flavor: Los elementales de tierra tienen la fortaleza eterna de la piedra y la resistencia de las montañas. En contacto primordial con la tierra que habitan, contemplan las cosas a largo plazo y desprecian la prisa impetuosa de las criaturas mortales de vida efímera.

foreignNames.name: Élémental de terre
foreignNames.flavor: Les élémentaux de terre possèdent la force éternelle de la pierre et l'endurance des montagnes. Spirituellement et corporellement reliés au sol qu'ils foulent, ils prennent la vie sur le long terme, méprisant la hâte intempestive des créatures mortelles.

foreignNames.name: Elementale della Terra
foreignNames.flavor: Gli elementali della terra hanno la forza eterna della pietra e la resistenza delle montagne. Legati fin dai primordi alla terra in cui abitano, hanno una visione a lungo termine del mondo e disprezzano la fretta impulsiva delle creature mortali dalla vita breve.

foreignNames.name: 大地の精霊
foreignNames.flavor: 大地の精霊は、石のごとき永遠の強さと、山のごとき忍耐を備える。 住まう大地と深く結ばれし原初よりの定めゆえ、大地の精霊は万事を長い目で見る。 短命なる死すべき定めの生き物たちの衝動的な性急さなど、大地の精霊にとっては軽侮の対象でしかない。

foreignNames.name: Elemental da Terra
foreignNames.flavor: Os elementais da terra possuem a força eterna da rocha e a resistência das montanhas. Primordialmente conectados à terra em que vivem, eles vêem tudo a longo prazo, desprezando a pressa impaciente das criaturas mortais de vida breve.

foreignNames.name: Земляной Элементаль
foreignNames.flavor: Земляные элементали обладают вечной силой камня и незыблемостью гор. Связанные древними и прочными узами со своей землей, они смотрят на мир через призму веков, презирая порывистость и спешку короткоживущих смертных.

foreignNames.name: 大地元素
foreignNames.flavor: 大地元素之力量如盘石，坚毅如山脉。 他们自古便立基于大地，碌碌众生的莽撞急切在其眼中显得可笑之至。

cards.name: Furnace of Rath
cards.text: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
cards.flavor: The furnace awaits the next master who would stoke the fires of apocalypse.

rulings.text: If a spell or ability damages multiple things, divide up the damage before applying this effect. This means you can’t normally end up with an odd amount of damage on something.
The trample rules cause damage to be divided before it is doubled.
If you have two of these on the battlefield, the damage is multiplied by 4.
The multiplied damage counts in all ways as if it came from the original source. Furnace of Rath is not the source.

If multiple effects modify how damage will be dealt, the player who would be dealt damage or the controller of the creature that would be dealt damage chooses the order to apply the effects. For example, Mending Hands says, “Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.” Suppose a spell would deal 5 damage to a player who has cast Mending Hands targeting themselves. That player can either (a) prevent 4 damage first and then let Furnace of Rath double the remaining 1 damage, taking 2 damage, or (b) double the damage to 10 and then prevent 4 damage, taking 6 damage.

cards.name: Guerrilla Tactics
cards.text:
Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

rulings.text: If it is discarded, the damage done by it is done by this card due to an ability and not by a spell.
The second ability will trigger even on an optional discard caused by an opponent.
Discarding as a cost to cast a spell will not trigger the ability. Only discarding as an effect will trigger the ability.

cards.originalText:
Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Hill Giant
cards.flavor: Fortunately, hill giants have large blind spots in which a human can easily hide. Unfortunately, these blind spots are beneath the bottoms of their feet.

foreignNames.name: Hügelriese
foreignNames.flavor: Glücklicherweise haben Hügelriesen große tote Winkel, in denen sich ein Mensch leicht verstecken kann. Leider jedoch befinden sich diese toten Winkel genau unter ihren Fußsohlen.

foreignNames.name: Gigante de las colinas
foreignNames.flavor: Afortunadamente, los gigantes de las colinas tienen un punto ciego donde un humano puede fácilmente esconderse. Desafortunadamente, ese punto ciego está bajo sus pies.

foreignNames.name: Géant des collines
foreignNames.flavor: Heureusement, il est facile de se cacher du regard d'un géant des collines. Malheureusement, ces cachettes sont toutes sous la plante de leurs pieds.

foreignNames.name: Gigante delle Colline
foreignNames.flavor: Per fortuna, i giganti delle colline hanno grandi zone cieche in cui un uomo può nascondersi. Sfortunatamente, queste zone sono sotto ai loro piedi.

foreignNames.name: 丘巨人
foreignNames.flavor: 幸運なことに、丘巨人には人間が簡単に隠れられる大きな死角がある。 不幸なのは、この死角が彼らの足の裏の下にあることだ。

foreignNames.name: Gigante da Colina
foreignNames.flavor: Felizmente, os gigantes da colina têm grandes pontos cegos, nos quais um ser humano pode se esconder com facilidade. Infelizmente, estes pontos ficam debaixo da sola de seus pés.

foreignNames.name: Гигант с Холмов
foreignNames.flavor: Хорошо, что есть зоны, которые не попадают в поле зрения гиганта с холмов и где человек может легко от него укрыться. Плохо, что эти "мертвые" зоны находятся у гиганта под пятками.

foreignNames.name: 山丘巨人
foreignNames.flavor: 幸运地，山丘巨人有着可让人类轻易躲藏的大盲点； 不幸地，这些盲点正位于其脚底下。

rulings.text: Regeneration abilities that would affect that creature can still be activated; they just won’t do anything. The creature can’t be regenerated for any reason, even if an effect other than Incinerate would deal lethal damage to it or otherwise destroy it.

cards.name: Manabarbs
cards.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.
cards.flavor:
"I don't know why people say a double-edged sword is bad. It's a sword. With two edges."
—Kamahl, pit fighter

rulings.text: This card has a triggered ability that causes a separate effect for 1 point of damage each time a land is tapped for mana.
This ability is not a mana ability. It goes on the stack and can be responded to.
The ability will trigger each time a land is tapped for mana. Each ability is separate.

If any lands are tapped for mana while a player is casting a spell or activating an ability, Manabarbs’s ability will trigger that many times and wait. When the player finishes casting that spell or activating that ability, it’s put on the stack, then Manabarbs’s triggered abilities are put on the stack on top of it. The Manabarbs abilities will resolve first.

On the other hand, a player can tap lands for mana, let the Manabarbs triggered abilities be put on the stack, and then respond to those abilities by casting an instant or activating an ability using that mana. In that case, the spell or ability will resolve first.

foreignNames.flavor: "Não sei porque as pessoas dizem que uma faca de dois gumes é ruim. É uma faca. Com dois gumes." — Kamahl, lutador da liça

foreignNames.name: Уколы Маны
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда игрок поворачивает землю для получения маны, Уколы Маны наносят тому игроку 1 повреждение.
foreignNames.flavor: "Я не понимаю, почему говорят, что обоюдоострый меч это плохо. Меч как меч. С двумя лезвиями". — Камаль, боец ямы

foreignNames.name: 法术力倒钩

foreignNames.flavor: 「我不知道为何人们总说双面刃不好。 这就是把剑。上面有两道刃。」 ～死斗战士卡马尔

cards.originalText: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.

cards.name: Mogg Fanatic

cards.flavor: "I got it! I got it! I—"

rulings.text: Once Mogg Fanatic has dealt and been dealt combat damage, it’s too late to activate its ability before it’s destroyed.

foreignNames.name: Fanatischer Mogg

foreignNames.flavor: „Ich hab' ihn Ich hab' ihn Ich..."

foreignNames.name: Mogg Fanatico

foreignNames.flavor: "Ce l'ho "Ce l'ho Ce. . ."

cards.originalText: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Orcish Artillery
cards.text: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"So they want to kill my men? Well two can play at that game."
—General Khurzog

rulings.text: You do not take the 3 points of damage if the ability doesn’t resolve because the target is illegal.

foreignNames.name: Ork-Artillerie
foreignNames.text: {T}: Die Ork-Artillerie fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte und dir 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Da Orks weder mathematisch noch sozial veranlagt sind, konnte ihnen der Nachteil eigener Verluste nie erklärt werden.

foreignNames.name: Artillería orca

foreignNames.flavor: "¿Quieren matar a mis hombres? Pues dos pueden jugar ese juego." —General Khurzog

foreignNames.name: Artillerie orque
foreignNames.text: {T} : L'Artillerie orque inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur, et vous inflige 3 blessures.
foreignNames.flavor: « Alors ils veulent tuer mes hommes ? Eh bien, on peut être deux pour jouer à ce jeu-là » —Général Khurzog

foreignNames.name: Artiglieria Orchesca

foreignNames.flavor: "Vogliono uccidere i miei uomini? Beh, questo è un gioco che si può fare in due." —Generale Khurzog

foreignNames.name: オーク弩弓隊

foreignNames.name: Артиллерия Орков

foreignNames.name: Piroclasma

cards.name: Rage Weaver

cards.flavor: "Let my passion spur your victory."

foreignNames.name: Weber des Zorns
foreignNames.text: {2}: Eine schwarze oder grüne Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Sie kann in diesem Zug angreifen und {T}.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Meine Leidenschaft soll deinen Sieg entzünden."

foreignNames.name: Tejedor de ira
foreignNames.text: {2}: La criatura objetivo negra o verde gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno. (Puede atacar y {T} este turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Que mi pasión estimule tu victoria."

foreignNames.name: Tisseur de rage
foreignNames.text: {2} : La créature noire ou verte ciblée acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Elle peut attaquer et {T} ce tour-ci.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Que ma passion encourage votre victoire. »

foreignNames.name: Tessitore di Rabbia
foreignNames.text: {2}: Una creatura nera o verde bersaglio ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno. (Può attaccare e {T} in questo turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Lascia che la mia passione sproni la tua vittoria."

foreignNames.name: 憤怒の織り手
foreignNames.text: {2}：黒か緑のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで速攻を持つ。 （それは攻撃したり{T}能力を使ったりできる。）
foreignNames.flavor: 私の情熱で、そなたの勝利に拍車をかけよう。

foreignNames.name: Tecelão da Raiva
foreignNames.text: {2}: A criatura alvo preta ou verde ganha ímpeto até o final do turno. (Ela pode atacar e {T} neste turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Que a minha paixão esporeie a tua vitória."

foreignNames.name: Плетельщик Ярости
foreignNames.text: {2}: Целевое черное или зеленое существо получает Ускорение до конца хода. (Оно может атаковать и {T} в этом ходу.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Пусть мой гнев ускорит твою победу".

foreignNames.name: 织怒巧匠
foreignNames.text: {2}：目标黑色或绿色生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。 （它此回合便能攻击与{T}。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「让我的热情激励你的胜利。」

cards.originalText: {2}: Target black or green creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Rage Weaver
cards.text: {2}: Target black or green creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: "Let my passion spur your victory."

cards.name: Raging Goblin
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
cards.flavor: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

foreignNames.name: Wütender Goblin
foreignNames.text: Eile (Diese Kreatur kann angreifen und {T}, sobald sie unter deine Kontrolle kommt.)
foreignNames.flavor: Er tobte gegen die Welt, gegen seine Familie, gegen sein Leben. Aber hauptsächlich tobte er.

foreignNames.name: Trasgo furioso
foreignNames.text: Prisa. (Esta criatura puede atacar y {T} tan pronto como entre bajo tu control.)
foreignNames.flavor: Estaba furioso con su mundo, con su familia, con su vida. Pero principalmente, sólo estaba furioso.

foreignNames.name: Gobelin enragé
foreignNames.text: Célérité (Cette créature peut attaquer et {T} dès le tour où elle arrive sous votre contrôle.)
foreignNames.flavor: Il enrageait contre le monde, contre sa famille, contre lui-même. Mais avant tout, il aimait juste être enragé.

foreignNames.name: Goblin Furioso
foreignNames.text: Rapidità (Questa creatura può attaccare e {T} non appena entra sotto il tuo controllo.)
foreignNames.flavor: E' arrabbiato con il mondo, con la propria famiglia e con la vita. Più che altro è arrabbiato e basta.

foreignNames.name: 怒り狂うゴブリン
foreignNames.text: 速攻 （このクリーチャーは、あなたのコントロール下になってすぐに攻撃したり{T}能力を使ったりできる。）
foreignNames.flavor: 彼は世界に対して怒り、家族に対して怒り、自分の人生に対して怒っていた。 だが、だいたいは理由もなく怒っていたんだ。

foreignNames.name: Goblin Enfurecido
foreignNames.text: Ímpeto (Esta criatura pode atacar e {T} assim que entra sob seu controle.)
foreignNames.flavor: Ele se enfurecia com o mundo, com sua família, com sua vida. Mas acima de tudo, ele se enfurecia.

foreignNames.name: Разъяренный Гоблин
foreignNames.text: Ускорение (Это существо может атаковать и {T}, как только оно попадает под ваш контроль.)
foreignNames.flavor: Он злился на мир, на семью, на свою жизнь. А вообще-то, он просто злился.

foreignNames.name: 愤怒精灵
foreignNames.text: 敏捷（此生物受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）
foreignNames.flavor: 他对世界、家庭和他的生活都感到愤怒。 但大多时候他只是纯粹愤怒。

cards.originalText: Haste

cards.name: Raging Goblin
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
cards.flavor: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

cards.name: Relentless Assault
cards.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
cards.flavor: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."

rulings.text: If you manage to cast this during a main phase of your opponent’s turn, that opponent’s creatures will untap and that opponent will be able to attack again. It will not allow you to attack during their turn.
Abilities that trigger when a creature attacks, blocks, or is blocked will trigger during each combat that turn. Thus, a creature with Rampage will get the bonus added during each attack.
A creature that must attack each turn, must only attack once that turn. It is not forced into each attack that turn.
It only creates an additional combat and main phase if it resolves during a main phase.

foreignNames.name: Unnachgiebiger Ansturm
foreignNames.text: Enttappe alle Kreaturen, die in diesem Zug angegriffen haben. Nach dieser Hauptphase gibt es eine zusätzliche Kampfphase, der eine zusätzliche Hauptphase folgt.
foreignNames.flavor: „Gnade? Gnade ist etwas für die Spielwiese, nicht für das Schlachtfeld."

foreignNames.name: Asalto implacable
foreignNames.text: Endereza todas las criaturas que atacaron este turno. Después de esta fase principal, hay una fase de combate adicional seguida de una fase principal adicional.
foreignNames.flavor: "¿Piedad? La piedad es para el jardín de juegos, no para el campo de batalla."

foreignNames.name: Assaut implacable
foreignNames.text: Dégagez toutes les créatures qui ont attaqué ce tour-ci. Cette phase principale est suivie d'une phase de combat supplémentaire, puis d'une phase principale supplémentaire.
foreignNames.flavor: « Pitié ? On est sur un champ de bataille, pas dans une cour de récréation. »

foreignNames.name: Assalto Implacabile
foreignNames.text: STAPpa tutte le creature che hanno attaccato in questo turno. Dopo questa fase principale, c'è una fase di combattimento addizionale seguita da una fase principale addizionale.
foreignNames.flavor: "Pietà? La pietà va bene nei campi da gioco, non nei campi di battaglia."

foreignNames.name: 連続突撃
foreignNames.text: このターン攻撃したすべてのクリーチャーをアンタップする。 このメイン・フェイズの後に、追加の戦闘フェイズとその後の追加のメイン・フェイズを加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 慈悲だと？ 慈悲ってのは遊び場での代物だ。戦場のものじゃない。

foreignNames.name: Assalto Implacável
foreignNames.text: Desvire todas as criaturas que atacaram neste turno. Após esta fase principal, há uma fase adicional de combate seguida por uma fase principal adicional.
foreignNames.flavor: "Piedade? Piedade é para o campo de recreio, não para o campo de batalha."

foreignNames.name: Неутомимая Атака
foreignNames.text: Разверните все существа, которые атаковали в этом ходу. После этой главной фазы идет дополнительная фаза боя, а за ней дополнительная главная фаза.
foreignNames.flavor: "Пощады? Пощада для сопляков, а не для воинов"

foreignNames.name: 无情的突袭
foreignNames.text: 重置所有于本回合中曾经攻击的生物。 在此行动阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段，以及接于其后之一个额外的行动阶段。
foreignNames.flavor: 「手下留情？ 运动场上才可能手下留情，战场上没这回事。」

cards.originalText: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

cards.name: Rock Badger
cards.text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
cards.flavor:
"As it charged our keep, I mistook it for a bear. After it tore through our ramparts and half the guard, I wished it had been a bear after all."
—Ballista guard

foreignNames.name: Felsdachs
foreignNames.text: Gebirgstarnung (Diese Kreatur ist unblockbar, solange der verteidigende Spieler ein Gebirge kontrolliert.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Als er auf unsere Festung zugestürmt kam, hielt ich ihn für einen Bären. Nachdem er große Lücken in unseren Wall und in die halbe Garde gerissen hatte, wünschte ich mir, es wäre ein Bär gewesen." —Ballistawachposten

foreignNames.name: Tejón de las rocas
foreignNames.text: Cruza montañas. (Esta criatura es imbloqueable mientras el jugador defensor controle una montaña.)
foreignNames.flavor: "En cuanto cargó contra nuestro puesto, lo confundí con un oso. Después de que destrozó a nuestro bastión y la mitad de la guardia, deseé que hubiera sido un oso." —Guardia de ballesta

foreignNames.name: Blaireau des rochers
foreignNames.text: Traversée des montagnes (Cette créature est imblocable tant que le joueur défenseur contrôle au moins une montagne.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Quand il a chargé la forteresse, j'ai cru que c'était un ours. Quand il a déchiqueté les remparts et la moitié de la garde, j'ai regretté que ça n'en soit pas un. » —Garde de baliste

foreignNames.name: Tasso delle Rocce
foreignNames.text: Passa-Montagne (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata fintanto che il giocatore in difesa controlla una Montagna.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Quando ha caricato contro la nostra fortezza, l'ho scambiato per un orso. Dopo che aveva squarciato i nostri bastioni e dilaniato metà delle guardie, ho desiderato che fosse solo un orso." —Guardia della balista

foreignNames.name: 岩アナグマ
foreignNames.text: 山渡り （このクリーチャーは防御プレイヤーが山をコントロールしている限りブロックされない。）
foreignNames.flavor: そいつが砦に突っ込んできたとき、熊と見間違ったんだ。 塁壁を引き裂き護衛を真っ二つにしたとき、とにかく熊であってくれと願ったよ。 ――バリスタの護衛

foreignNames.name: Texugo das Rochas
foreignNames.text: Travessia de Montanha (Esta criatura não poderá ser bloqueada enquanto o jogador defensor controlar uma Montanha.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Quando ele atacou nossa fortaleza, eu o confundi com um urso. Depois que estraçalhou nossas defesas e metade da guarda, desejei que fosse realmente um urso." — Guarda balista

foreignNames.name: Скальный Барсук
foreignNames.text: Знание Гор (Это существо не может быть заблокировано, пока защищающийся игрок контролирует Гору.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Когда он напал на нашу крепость, я было принял его за медведя. Но после того, как он преодолел крепостной вал и прорвался через караул, я понял, что лучше бы он все-таки был медведем". — Стражник баллисты

foreignNames.name: 岩獾
foreignNames.text: 山脉行者（只要防御牌手操控山脉，此生物便不能被阻挡）
foreignNames.flavor: 「他冲向要塞时，我还当成是头熊。 到了他撞破壁垒与半数卫兵后，我真巴不得他是头熊。」 ～巨弩守卫

cards.flavor:
"As it charged our keep, I mistook it for a bear. After it tore through our ramparts and half the guard, I wished it had been a bear after all."

cards.name: Shunt
cards.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
cards.flavor: Aranghil held her fury in her heart, hard and bright as a ruby. With its razor edge, she rewrote the laws of battle.

rulings.text: The target of a spell that targets another spell on the stack can be changed to any other spell on the stack, even if the new target will resolve before the spell does.
You can’t make a spell which is on the stack target itself.

You can choose to make a spell on the stack target this spell (if such a target choice would be legal had the spell been cast while this spell was on the stack). The new target for the deflected spell is not chosen until this spell resolves. This spell is still on the stack when new targets are selected for the spell.
Once the spell resolves, the new target is considered to be targeted by the deflected spell. This will trigger any effects which trigger on being targeted.
This does not check if the current target is legal. It just checks if the spell has a single target.
You choose the spell to target on announcement, but you pick the new target for that spell on resolution.
If there is no other legal target for the spell, this does not change the target.
This only targets the spell being changed, not the original or new target of the spell it is affecting.
If a spell targets multiple things, you can’t target it with Shunt, even if all but one of those targets has become illegal.
If a spell targets the same player or object multiple times, you can’t target it with Shunt.

Détruisez l'artefact ciblé.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Les lois de Ravnica ne protègent pas ses citoyens, mais son industrie. L'équipement vétuste est détruit plutôt que restauré, pour apporter encore plus d'argent dans les coffres des usines.

foreignNames.name: Spaccare
foreignNames.text:
Distruggi un artefatto bersaglio.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Le leggi di Ravnica non proteggono i suoi cittadini ma le sue fabbriche. L'equipaggiamento meno recente viene distrutto invece di essere riparato, per portare più soldi nelle casse delle industrie.

foreignNames.name: スマッシュ
foreignNames.text:
アーティファクト１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: ラヴニカの法が守るのは、市民ではなく産業だ。 古くなった装具は修理せずに壊し、工場の金庫にさらに金を積み上げるのだ。

foreignNames.name: Esmagar
foreignNames.text:
Destrua o artefato alvo.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: As leis de Ravnica não protegem seus cidadãos, mas sua indústria. Tudo o que é velho é destruído, em vez de restaurado, para trazer mais dinheiro para os cofres das fábricas.

foreignNames.name: Разгром
foreignNames.text:
Уничтожьте целевой артефакт.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Законы Равники защищают промышленность, а не жителей. Устаревшее оборудование чаще уничтожается, чем восстанавливается, чтобы принести больше денег в казну фабрик.

foreignNames.name: 破碎击
foreignNames.text:
消灭目标神器。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 拉尼卡的法律是用来保护工业，而不是保护市民。 老旧的武具均应销毁而不予修复，如此才能充实工厂的金库。

cards.originalText:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Soulblast
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice all creatures you control.
Soulblast deals damage to any target equal to the total power of the sacrificed creatures.

foreignNames.name: Seelenexplosion
foreignNames.text:
Opfere alle Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, als zusätzliche Kosten, um Seelenexplosion zu spielen.
Die Seelenexplosion fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe der zusammengezählten Stärke der geopferten Kreaturen zu.

foreignNames.name: Ráfaga de almas
foreignNames.text:
Como coste adicional para jugar la Ráfaga de almas, sacrifica todas las criaturas que controles.
La Ráfaga de almas hace una cantidad de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo igual a la fuerza total de las criaturas sacrificadas.

foreignNames.name: Salve d'âmes
foreignNames.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour jouer la Salve d'âmes, sacrifiez toutes les créatures que vous contrôlez.
La Salve d'âmes inflige à une cible, créature ou joueur, un nombre de blessures égal à la force totale des créatures sacrifiées.

foreignNames.name: Esplosione dell'Anima
foreignNames.text:
Come costo addizionale per giocare l'Esplosione dell'Anima, sacrifica tutte le creature che controlli.
L'Esplosione dell'Anima infligge danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio pari alla forza totale delle creature sacrificate.

foreignNames.name: 心魂破
foreignNames.text:
心魂破をプレイするための追加コストとして、あなたがコントロールするすべてのクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる。
クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。心魂破はそれに、その生け贄に捧げたクリーチャーのパワーの合計に等しい点数のダメージを与える。

foreignNames.name: Explosão da Alma
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para jogar Explosão da Alma, sacrifique todas as criaturas que você controla.
Explosão da Alma causa uma quantidade de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo igual à soma do poder das criaturas sacrificadas.

foreignNames.name: Порыв Души
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания Порыва Души, пожертвуйте все существа под вашим контролем.
Порыв Души наносит целевому существу или игроку количество повреждений, равное общей силе пожертвованных существ.

foreignNames.name: 灵魂冲击
foreignNames.text:
牺牲所有由你操控的生物，以作为使用灵魂冲击的额外费用。
灵魂冲击对目标生物或牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于所牺牲之生物的力量总和。

cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to play Soulblast, sacrifice all creatures you control.
Soulblast deals damage to target creature or player equal to the total power of the sacrificed creatures.

cards.name: Spark Elemental
cards.text:
Trample, haste (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental.

foreignNames.name: Funkenelementar
foreignNames.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden, Eile (Falls diese Kreatur ihren Blockern genug Schaden zufügen würde, um sie zu zerstören, kannst du sie den Rest des Schadens dem verteidigenden Spieler zufügen lassen. Diese Kreatur kann angreifen und {T}, sobald sie unter deine Kontrolle kommt.)
Opfere das Funkenelementar am Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Vulshokschamanen schafften es nicht, sie länger als ein paar Sekunden am Leben zu erhalten, aber diese wenigen Momente reichten meistens aus.

foreignNames.name: Elemental de chispas
foreignNames.text:
Arrolla, prisa. (Si esta criatura fuera a hacer suficiente daño de combate a sus bloqueadores como para destruirlos, puedes hacer que le haga el resto del daño al jugador defensor. Esta criatura puede atacar y {T} tan pronto como entre bajo tu control.)
Al final del turno, sacrifica el Elemental de chispas.
foreignNames.flavor: Los chamanes vúlshok nunca pudieron mantenerlos vivos por más que unos segundos, pero esos segundos parecían ser suficiente.

foreignNames.name: Élémental d'étincelles
foreignNames.text:
Piétinement, célérité (Si cette créature inflige suffisamment de blessures de combat à ses bloqueurs pour les détruire, vous pouvez faire qu'elle inflige le reste de ses blessures au joueur défenseur. Cette créature peut attaquer et {T} dès le tour où elle arrive sous votre contrôle.)
À la fin du tour, sacrifiez l'Élémental d'étincelles.
foreignNames.flavor: Les shamanes vulshoks ne pouvaient pas les maintenir en vie plus de quelques secondes, mais cela semblait toujours suffire.

foreignNames.name: Elementale Scintillante
foreignNames.text:
Travolgere, rapidità (Se questa creatura sta per infliggere alle sue creature bloccanti danno da combattimento sufficiente a distruggerle, puoi farle infliggere il resto del suo danno al giocatore in difesa. Questa creatura può attaccare e {T} non appena entra sotto il tuo controllo.)
Alla fine del turno, sacrifica l'Elementale Scintillante.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli sciamani Vulshok non riuscivano mai a tenerli in vita per più di qualche secondo, ma quei pochi secondi sembravano sufficienti.

foreignNames.name: 火花の精霊
foreignNames.text:
トランプル、速攻 （このクリーチャーが、自身をブロックしているすべてのクリーチャーを破壊するのに十分な戦闘ダメージを与える場合、あなたはそれの残りのダメージを防御プレイヤーに与えてもよい。 このクリーチャーは、あなたのコントロール下になってすぐに攻撃したり{T}能力を使ったりできる。）
ターン終了時に、火花の精霊を生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.flavor: ヴァルショクのシャーマンでも、それを数秒以上生かしておくことはできない。が、その数秒で十分のようだ。

foreignNames.name: Elemental das Centelhas
foreignNames.text:
Atropelar, ímpeto (Se esta criatura fosse causar dano de combate suficiente para destruir seus bloqueadores, você pode fazer com que ela cause o resto de seu dano ao jogador defensor.) Esta criatura pode atacar e {T} assim que entra sob seu controle.)
No final do turno, sacrifique Elemental das Centelhas.
foreignNames.flavor: Os xamãs vulshoques nunca conseguiam mantê-los vivos por mais de alguns segundos, mas ainda assim aqueles poucos segundos pareceram ser suficientes.

foreignNames.name: Искра-Элементаль
foreignNames.text:
Пробивной удар, Ускорение (Если это существо нанесло достаточно боевых повреждений, чтобы уничтожить блокирующие его существа, вы можете нанести оставшиеся повреждения защищающемуся игроку. Это существо может атаковать и {T}, как только оно попадает под ваш контроль.)
В конце хода пожертвуйте Искра-Элементаля.
foreignNames.flavor: Шаманы вулшоков никак не могли сохранить в них жизнь более чем на несколько секунд, но и этого ничтожного времени было предостаточно.

foreignNames.name: 星火元素
foreignNames.text:
践踏，敏捷（若此生物将造成的战斗伤害足以消灭所有阻挡它的生物，你可以使它对防御牌手造成所剩余数量的伤害。 此生物受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）
在回合结束时，牺牲星火元素。
foreignNames.flavor: 瓦许克祭师只有本领让他们活上几秒钟，但这几秒便已足够。

cards.originalText:
Trample, haste
At end of turn, sacrifice Spark Elemental.

cards.name: Spark Elemental
cards.text:
Trample, haste (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental.
cards.flavor: Vulshok shamans could never keep them alive for more than a few seconds, yet those few seconds seemed to be enough.

cards.name: Spitting Earth
cards.text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
cards.flavor:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
—Kumano, to his pupils

foreignNames.name: Kochende Erde
foreignNames.text: Kochende Erde fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe der Anzahl der Gebirge, die du kontrollierst, zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „In jedem von euch steckt die Gewalt eines Erdrutsches." —Kumano zu seinen Schülern

foreignNames.name: Sacudida telúrica
foreignNames.text: La Sacudida telúrica hace una cantidad de daño igual al número de montañas que controles a la criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Dentro de cada uno de ustedes está la fuerza de una avalancha." —Kumano, a sus alumnos

foreignNames.name: Expectoration tellurique
foreignNames.text: L'Expectoration tellurique inflige à la créature ciblée un nombre de blessures égal au nombre de montagnes que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: « En chacun de vous réside la force d'un glissement de terrain. » —Kumano, à ses élèves

foreignNames.name: Fulmine Tellurico
foreignNames.text: Il Fulmine Tellurico infligge danno a una creatura bersaglio pari al numero di Montagne che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ognuno di voi ha dentro la forza di una frana." —Kumano, ai suoi allievi

foreignNames.name: 大地の飛礫
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。大地の飛礫はそれに、あなたがコントロールする山の総数に等しい点数のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 各々の中に山崩れの力有り。 ――熊野から学徒へ。

foreignNames.name: Golfada de Terra
foreignNames.text: Golfada de Terra causa à criatura alvo uma quantidade de dano igual ao número de Montanhas que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: "Dentro de cada um de vocês está o poder de um deslizamento de terra." — Kumano, a seus alunos

foreignNames.name: Земляные Всплески
foreignNames.text: Земляные Всплески наносят целевому существу повреждения, равные количеству Гор под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: "В каждом из вас скрыта сила оползня". — Обращение Кумано к своим ученикам

foreignNames.name: 飞砾走石
foreignNames.text: 飞砾走石对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的山脉数量。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你们每人都拥有山崩般的潜力。」 ～熊野勉励弟子

cards.originalText: Spitting Earth deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.

cards.name: Squee, Goblin Nabob
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return Squee, Goblin Nabob from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"Some goblins are expendable. Some are impossible to get rid of. But he's both—at the same time!"
—Starke

rulings.text: If Squee isn’t in your graveyard as your upkeep begins, its ability won’t trigger. You can’t take any actions during your turn before your upkeep begins.

foreignNames.name: Squee, Goblin-Nabob
foreignNames.text: Du kannst zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments Squee, Goblin-Nabob aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurückbringen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Einige Goblins sind entbehrlich. Manche kann man einfach nicht loswerden. Aber für ihn gilt beides — gleichzeitig" —Starke

foreignNames.name: Squee, trasgo nabab
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes regresar a Squee, trasgo nabab de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: "Algunos trasgos son sacrificables. Algunos es imposible librarse de ellos. Pero él es ambas cosas, ¡al mismo tiempo" —Starke

foreignNames.name: Skwi, nabab gobelin
foreignNames.text: Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez renvoyer Skwi, nabab gobelin depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: « Certains gobelins sont sacrifiables. D'autres, on ne parvient pas à s'en débarrasser. Lui, c'est les deux à la fois » —Starke

foreignNames.name: Squee, Nababbo Goblin
foreignNames.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi riprendere in mano Squee, Nababbo Goblin dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: "Alcuni goblin sono sacrificabili. Alcuni sono impossibili da eliminare. Ma lui è entrambe le cose. . . allo stesso tempo" —Starke

foreignNames.name: ゴブリンの太守スクイー
foreignNames.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたはあなたの墓地にあるゴブリンの太守スクイーをあなたの手札に戻してもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 消耗品のゴブリンもいる。 追い出せないゴブリンもいる。 でも、こいつは両方だ――しかも同時にだ！ ――スターク

foreignNames.name: Squee, Nabobo Goblin
foreignNames.text: No início de sua manutenção, você pode devolver Squee, Nabobo Goblin de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: "Alguns goblins são descartáveis. De outros é impossível se livrar. Mas ele é as duas coisas ao mesmo tempo" — Starke

foreignNames.name: Скви, Гоблин-Набоб
foreignNames.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки вы можете вернуть Скви, Гоблина-Набоба из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor: "Некоторых гоблинов можно использовать и забыть. От некоторых, наоборот, невозможно избавиться. Этот же и то, и другое, в одном лице" — Старк

foreignNames.name: 精灵总督斯奎
foreignNames.text: 在你的维持开始时，你可以将精灵总督斯奎从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「有些精灵是消耗品。 有些则根本摆脱不掉。 但他两者都是～摆脱不掉的消耗品！」 ～史塔克

cards.originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return Squee, Goblin Nabob from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Stun
cards.text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Fortunately, merfolk aren't used to opponents with feet."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

rulings.text: Must be used before blockers are declared in order to affect blocking decisions. You can’t wait to see what your opponent declares and then try to stop them.
You can use it after combat or even on a creature which can’t possibly block this turn because it’s that player’s turn to attack, but it generally has no effect other than to let you draw a card.

foreignNames.name: Betäubung
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl kann in diesem Zug nicht blocken.Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Zum Glück sind Meermänner nicht an Gegner mit Füßen gewöhnt." —Gerrard von der Wetterlicht

foreignNames.name: Aturdir
foreignNames.text:
La criatura objetivo no puede bloquear este turno.
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Por suerte, los tritones no están acostumbrados a oponentes con pies." —Gerrard del Vientoligero

foreignNames.name: Étourdissement
foreignNames.text:
La créature ciblée ne peut pas bloquer ce tour-ci.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Heureusement, les ondins n'ont pas l'habitude de combattre des adversaires qui ont des pieds. » —Gerrard de l'Aquilon

foreignNames.name: Stordire
foreignNames.text:
Una creatura bersaglio non può bloccare in questo turno.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Per fortuna, i tritoni non sono abituati ad avversari con i piedi." —Gerrard della Cavalcavento

foreignNames.name: 気絶
foreignNames.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それではブロックできない。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: ありがたいことに、マーフォークは足のついてる敵と戦うのに慣れてないんだ。 ――ウェザーライト号のジェラード

foreignNames.name: Atordoar
foreignNames.text:
A criatura alvo não pode bloquear neste turno.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Felizmente, os tritões não estão acostumados a oponentes com dois pés." — Gerrard do Bons Ventos

foreignNames.name: Оглушение
foreignNames.text:
Целевое существо не может блокировать в этом ходу.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: "К счастью, мерфолки не привыкли к ходячим противникам". — Джерард с Везерлайта

foreignNames.name: 愣定
foreignNames.text:
目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「幸好，人鱼不太习惯有脚的对手。」 ～晴空号的杰拉尔德

cards.originalText:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Sudden Impact
cards.text: Sudden Impact deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Some say it's better to think before you act. While those people are considering all the options, that's usually when I kill them."
—Dravus, lava mage

foreignNames.name: Plötzlicher Aufprall
foreignNames.text: Der Plötzliche Aufprall fügt einem Spieler deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe der Anzahl an Karten auf seiner Hand zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Es gibt Leute, die sagen, man soll denken, bevor man handelt. Und während diese Leute alle Möglichkeiten bedenken, habe ich genug Zeit, sie zu töten." —Dravus, Lavamagier

foreignNames.name: Impacto súbito
foreignNames.text: El Impacto súbito hace una cantidad de daño igual al número de cartas que haya en la mano del jugador objetivo a ese jugador.
foreignNames.flavor: "Algunos dicen que es mejor pensar antes de actuar. Mientras esa gente considera las opciones, entonces es cuando las mato." —Dravus, mago de lava

foreignNames.name: Choc soudain
foreignNames.text: Le Choc soudain inflige au joueur ciblé un nombre de blessures égal au nombre de cartes dans la main de ce joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: « Certains disent qu'il vaut mieux réfléchir avant d'agir. Et c'est pendant que ces gens réfléchissent que je les tue. » —Dravus, mage des laves

foreignNames.name: Impatto Improvviso
foreignNames.text: L'Impatto Improvviso infligge danno a un giocatore bersaglio pari al numero di carte in mano a quel giocatore.
foreignNames.flavor: "Alcuni dicono che sia meglio pensare prima di agire. E mentre considerano tutte le opzioni, io li uccido." —Dravus, mago della lava

foreignNames.name: 突然の衝撃
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。突然の衝撃はそのプレイヤーに、そのプレイヤーの手札のカードの枚数に等しい点数のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 何かする前に考えた方がいいなんてやつもいるさ。 そいつらは全部の選択肢を考えてる間に――俺がそいつらを殺しちまうんだがな。 ――溶岩魔道士、ドレイヴァス

foreignNames.name: Impacto Súbito
foreignNames.text: Impacto Súbito causa ao jogador alvo uma quantidade de dano igual ao número de cards na mão daquele jogador.
foreignNames.flavor: "Algumas pessoas dizem que é melhor pensar antes de agir. Enquanto essas pessoas estão considerando todas as opções, é quando normalmente eu as mato." — Dravus, mago da lava

foreignNames.name: Внезапный Удар
foreignNames.text: Внезапный Удар наносит целевому игроку столько повреждений, сколько карт находится в его руке.
foreignNames.flavor: "Некоторые полагают, что лучше сначала думать, а потом делать. Вот пока они обдумывают все возможности, я их обычно и убиваю". — Дравус, маг лавы

foreignNames.name: 猛然撞击
foreignNames.text: 猛然撞击对目标牌手造成等同于该牌手之手牌数量的伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「有人认为先考虑再行动才稳当。 我拿下的人头通常都还在考虑各种应对之道。」 ～熔岩法师赭拉瓦

cards.originalText: Sudden Impact deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.

cards.name: Threaten
cards.text: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: Goblins' motivational techniques are crude, but effective.

foreignNames.name: Bedrohen
foreignNames.text: Enttappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl und übernimm bis zum Ende des Zuges die Kontrolle über sie. Diese Kreatur erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Sie kann in diesem Zug angreifen und {T}.)
foreignNames.flavor: Die Motivationskünste der Goblins sind plump, aber effektiv.

foreignNames.name: Amenazar
foreignNames.text: Endereza la criatura objetivo y gana el control de ella hasta el final del turno. Esa criatura gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno. (Puede atacar y {T} este turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: Las técnicas motivadoras de los trasgos son rudimentarias, pero efectivas.

foreignNames.name: Menace
foreignNames.text: Dégagez la créature ciblée et acquérez-en le contrôle jusqu'à la fin du tour. Cette créature acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Elle peut attaquer et {T} ce tour-ci.)
foreignNames.flavor: Les stages de motivation chez les gobelins sont rudimentaires, mais efficaces.

foreignNames.name: Minacciare
foreignNames.text: STAPpa una creatura bersaglio e prendine il controllo fino alla fine del turno. Quella creatura ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno. (Può attaccare e {T} in questo turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: Le tecniche motivazionali dei Goblin sono un po' rozze, ma efficaci.

foreignNames.name: 脅しつけ

cards.name: Warp World
cards.text: Each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library.

rulings.text: Anything that triggers during the resolution of this will wait to be put on the stack until everything is put onto the battlefield and resolution is complete. The player whose turn it is will put all of their triggered abilities on the stack in any order, then each other player in turn order will do the same. (The last ability put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.)

Taking it slowly, here's what happens when Warp World resolves: 1) Each player counts the number of permanents they own. 2) Each player shuffles those permanents into their library. 3) Each player reveals cards from the top of their library equal to the number that player counted. 4) Each player puts all artifact, land, and creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield. All of these cards enter the battlefield at the same time. 5) Each player puts all enchantment cards revealed this way onto the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way can enchant an artifact, land, or creature that was already put onto the battlefield, but can't enchant an enchantment that's being put onto the battlefield at the same time as it. If multiple players have Auras to put onto the battlefield, the player whose turn it is announces what their Auras will enchant, then each other player in turn order does the same, then all enchantments (both Auras and non-Auras) enter the battlefield at the same time. 6) Each player puts all of their other revealed cards (instants, sorceries, planeswalkers, and Auras that can't enchant anything) on the bottom of their library in any order.

Tokens are permanents but not cards. They’ll count toward the number of permanents shuffled into your library, so you’ll get a card back for each token you owned. But the tokens themselves should be ignored while you’re revealing *cards* from your library. In practice, you shouldn’t actually shuffle them into your library since they’ll cease to exist as soon as Warp World finishes resolving. Note that a token’s owner is the player under whose control it first entered the battlefield.

foreignNames.text: 各プレイヤーは自分がオーナーであるすべてのパーマネントを自分のライブラリーに加えて切り直し、自分のライブラリーの一番上からその総数に等しい枚数のカードを公開する。 各プレイヤーは、これにより公開されたすべてのアーティファクト・カードとクリーチャー・カードと土地カードを場に出し、その後、これにより公開されたすべてのエンチャント・カードを場に出し、その後、これにより公開されたカードのうち場に出なかったすべてのカードを自分のライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。

foreignNames.name: Mundo Corrompido
foreignNames.text: Cada jogador embaralha todas as permanentes que lhe pertencem em seu grimório e revela aquela quantidade de cards do topo de seu grimório. Cada jogador coloca em jogo todos os cards de artefato, criatura e terreno revelados desta forma; em seguida, coloca em jogo todos os cards de encantamento revelados desta forma; e, depois, coloca todos os cards revelados desta forma que não foram colocados em jogo no fundo de seu grimório, em qualquer ordem.

foreignNames.name: Искривленный Мир
foreignNames.text: Каждый игрок втасовывает все принадлежащие ему перманенты в свою библиотеку, затем показывает такое же количество карт с верха своей библиотеки. Каждый игрок кладет в игру все карты артефактов, существ и земель, показанные таким образом, затем кладет в игру все карты чар, показанные таким образом, а затем кладет в низ своей библиотеки в любом порядке все остальные показанные таким образом карты, которые не были положены в игру.

foreignNames.name: 歪曲世相
foreignNames.text: 每位牌手把由他拥有的所有永久物洗入其牌库，然后从其牌库顶展示等量的牌。 每位牌手把以此法展示的所有神器，生物，与地牌放置进场，然后把以此法展示的所有结界牌放置进场，然后将所有以此法展示且未放置进场的牌以任意顺序置于其牌库底。

cards.originalText: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way into play, then puts all enchantment cards revealed this way into play, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put into play on the bottom of his or her library in any order.

cards.name: Burrowing
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
cards.originalText: Target creature gains mountainwalk.

cards.name: Chaoslace
cards.text: Target spell or permanent becomes red. (Its mana symbols remain unchanged.)
cards.originalText: Changes the color of one card either being played or already in play to red. Cost to cast, tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target card remains entirely unchanged.

cards.name: Disintegrate
cards.text: Disintegrate deals X damage to any target. If it's a creature, it can't be regenerated this turn, and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: The “can’t regenerate” is an effect of Disintegrate and not an effect of the damage. It works even if the damage is prevented or redirected. If redirected, the damage does not take this effect with it.
Disintegrated creatures do not go to the graveyard at all before being exiled. They do not trigger abilities which trigger due to a creature going to the graveyard.

cards.originalText: Disintegrate does X damage to one target. If target dies this turn, it is removed from game entirely and cannot be regenerated. Return target to its owner's deck only when game is over.

cards.name: Dragon Whelp
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor:
"O to be a dragon . . . of silkworm size or immense . . ."
—Marianne Moore, *"O to Be a Dragon"*

rulings.text: The first three times Dragon Whelp’s ability is activated in a turn will do nothing other than give it +1/+0 until end of turn. Any subsequent activations will also cause its delayed triggered ability to trigger. That means if you activate Dragon Whelp’s ability five times, for example, two different delayed triggered abilities will trigger at the beginning of the next end step and cause you to sacrifice Dragon Whelp.

If the fourth (or more) time Dragon Whelp’s ability is activated during the same turn happens to be during that turn’s end step, the delayed triggered ability won’t trigger until the beginning of the next turn’s end step. You’ll have to sacrifice Dragon Whelp at that time.

cards.originalText:
Flying
ooR +1/+0 until end of turn; if more than oRoRoR is spent in this way, Dragon Whelp is destroyed at end of turn.

cards.name: Dwarven Demolition Team
cards.text: {T}: Destroy target Wall.
cards.flavor: Foolishly, Najib retreated to his castle at El-Abar; the next morning he was dead. In just one night, the dwarven forces had reduced the mighty walls to mere rubble.
cards.originalText: Tap to destroy a wall.

cards.name: Dwarven Warriors
cards.text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

rulings.text: The ability can be activated after a creature is blocked, but it has no effect. Once a creature is blocked, it can’t be unblocked.
If you increase the power of the targeted creature after the ability resolves, it still can’t be blocked that turn.

cards.originalText: Tap to make a creature of power no greater than 2 unblockable until end of turn. Other cards may later be used to increase target creature's power beyond 2 after defense is chosen.

cards.name: Earth Elemental
cards.flavor: Earth Elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

cards.name: Earthbind
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Earthbind enters the battlefield, if enchanted creature has flying, Earthbind deals 2 damage to that creature and Earthbind gains "Enchanted creature loses flying."

rulings.text: If the enchanted creature gains flying after Earthbind is put onto it, it will have flying. The two effects are simply applied in timestamp order.

cards.originalText: Earthbind does 2 damage to target flying creature, which also loses flying ability.

cards.name: Earthquake
cards.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature is without flying is only checked on resolution.

cards.originalText: Does X damage to each player and each non-flying creature in play.

cards.name: False Orders
cards.text:
Cast this spell only during the declare blockers step.
Remove target creature defending player controls from combat. Creatures it was blocking that had become blocked by only that creature this combat become unblocked. You may have it block an attacking creature of your choice.

rulings.text: If a creature is removed from being a blocker of a given attacker, any triggered abilities that would have happened because it was declared as a blocker still happen.

cards.originalText: You decide whether and how one defending creature blocks, though you can't make a choice the defender couldn't legally make. Play after defender has chosen defense but before damage is dealt.

cards.name: Fire Elemental
cards.flavor: Fire Elementals are ruthless infernos, annihilating and consuming their foes in a frenzied holocaust. Crackling and blazing, they sear swift, terrible paths, leaving the land charred and scorched in their wake.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

rulings.text: For example, if X is 5 and you choose three target creatures, Fireball has a total cost of {7}{R} (even though its mana cost is just {5}{R} and its converted mana cost is 6). If those creatures are all still legal targets as Fireball resolves, it deals 1 damage to each of them.
You may cast Fireball with zero targets, regardless of the value chosen for X. If you do so, it will not be a targeted spell, and no damage will actually be dealt when it resolves.
Fireball’s damage is divided as Fireball resolves, not as it’s cast, because there are no choices involved. The division involves only targets that are still legal as Fireball resolves.
You can target more than X creatures. However, if the number of legal targets at the time Fireball resolves is greater than X, none of them will be dealt any damage.

cards.originalText: Fireball does X damage total, divided evenly (round down) among any number of targets. Pay 1 extra mana for each target beyond the first.

cards.name: Firebreathing
cards.text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"And topples round the dreary west A looming bastion fringed with fire."
—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, *"In Memoriam"*

rulings.text: This ability can be activated by Firebreathing’s controller, not the enchanted creature’s controller (in case they’re different players).
The ability affects whichever creature is enchanted by Firebreathing at the time the ability resolves. The bonus remains even if Firebreathing stops enchanting that creature.

cards.name: Flashfires
cards.text: Destroy all Plains.
cards.originalText: All plains in play are destroyed.

cards.name: Fork
cards.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell, except that the copy is red. You may choose new targets for the copy.

rulings.text: Fork will not copy changes made by modifying effects to the spell prior to the use of Fork, such as text-changing effects.
If mana or other costs need to be spent at resolution of the spell, the player of Fork would still be responsible for paying that cost.
You need not (and may not) pay any additional mana or other costs (like sacrifices) to use the spell which is Forked. You get control over a complete copy but can change nothing except the targets.
Fork does not let you make non-targeting choices about the spell.
When a spell with additional costs is copied, you don’t have to pay those costs again.
If you copy a spell for which Buyback has been paid, you get nothing back since the copied spell does not have a card to give you.
The copy that is placed on the stack is not considered to have been “cast”.
The Fork card goes to the graveyard when it resolves and leaves the copy on the stack. There is no card representing the copy on the stack.

It does copy the mana symbols in the mana cost for the card it is copying, but it uses its own color definition and not the one from those mana symbols. This is so it maintains its color just like the text says.

If the spell being copied targets a spell on the stack, it is possible to target Fork itself since Fork is still on the stack when you pick the target(s) for the copy. Note that the copy’s target will be illegal when it resolves.
For spells that can have a variable number of targets, the controller of the copy must use the same number of targets the original spell did.
Forking a spell with an X in the cost requires you to use the same X value.
If you Fork a Spliced spell, the spliced text is added during the announcement of the original spell, and therefore is fully copied by Fork.
The copy will have the same mana cost as the original spell, but will be red rather than whatever color that mana cost would have made it.
If the targeted spell was kicked, then the copy will be kicked as well. If the targeted spell was not kicked, then the copy will not be kicked.

cards.originalText: Any sorcery or instant spell just cast is doubled. Treat Fork as an exact copy of target spell except that Fork remains red. Copy and original may have different targets.

cards.name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
cards.text: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "From up here we can drop rocks and arrows and more rocks!" "Uh, yeah boss, but how do we get down?"

rulings.text: You can activate the ability repeatedly during a turn. This generally has no additional effect, unless some other effect (like that from Adarkar Windform has caused it to lose flying since the last time the ability resolved.

For flying to work as an evasion ability, an attacking Goblin Balloon Brigade’s ability must be activated before the declare blockers step begins. Once Goblin Balloon Brigade has become blocked, giving it flying won’t change that.

cards.originalText: ooR Goblins gain flying ability until end of turn. Controller may not choose to make Goblins fly after they have been blocked.

cards.name: Goblin King
cards.text: Other Goblins get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk.
cards.flavor: To become king of the Goblins, one must assassinate the previous king. Thus, only the most foolish seek positions of leadership.

rulings.text: Goblin King now has the Goblin creature type and its ability has been reworded to affect *other* Goblins. This means that if two Goblin Kings are on the battlefield, each gives the other a bonus.

cards.originalText: Goblins in play gain mountainwalk and +1/+1 while this card remains in play.

cards.name: Granite Gargoyle
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Granite Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"While most overworlders fortunately don't realize this, Gargoyles can be most delicious, providing you have the appropriate tools to carve them."
—*The Underworld Cookbook*, by Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar
cards.originalText: Flying; ooR +0/+1 until end of turn.
